creativeDirectorNotes: This design embodies a 'Productive Clarity' aesthetic. We aim for a clean, modern, and highly intuitive user experience that empowers users without overwhelming them. The interface is professional yet approachable, leveraging soft forms and strategic color accents to guide attention and convey progress.

designPrinciples.name: Productive Clarity
designPrinciples.description: Prioritize clear, concise information display and actionable insights. Reduce visual clutter to enhance focus on data and tasks.

designPrinciples.name: Soft Modernism
designPrinciples.description: Utilize rounded corners, subtle shadows, and ample whitespace to create a friendly, contemporary feel, avoiding harsh edges or excessive gradients (except for intentional highlights).

designPrinciples.name: Intuitive Navigation
designPrinciples.description: Ensure core features are easily discoverable and accessible through a consistent, organized navigation structure and visual hierarchy.

designPrinciples.name: Strategic Accents
designPrinciples.description: Employ a limited, vibrant color palette (primarily purple and orange) to highlight key information, interactive elements, and progress, drawing the eye without distraction.

designPrinciples.name: Data-Driven Storytelling
designPrinciples.description: Present complex data through simple, legible visualizations that offer immediate understanding and encourage user engagement with their productivity metrics.

designPrinciples.name: Consistent Experience
designPrinciples.description: Maintain uniformity in component styling, typography, and spacing across the entire application to build trust and reduce cognitive load.

primary.name: Equa White
primary.usage: Main background for content areas, sidebar, and most cards. Represents cleanliness and spaciousness.

primary.name: Charcoal Black
primary.usage: Main headings, large numbers, and critical body text for maximum readability.

secondary.name: Mid Grey
secondary.usage: Subtitles, labels, inactive navigation items, placeholder text. Provides contrast without harshness.

tertiary.name: Light Grey
tertiary.usage: Subtle descriptors, less important details, borders for inactive states.

accentSuccess.name: Emerald Green
accentSuccess.usage: Positive status indicators, percentage increases (e.g., '+12% vs last week').

purple.name: Deep Lavender
purple.gradient: Linear gradient from #4A00E0 to #8E2DE2 (or similar deep purple to magenta for AI Insights card)
purple.usage: Primary brand accent. Active states, progress indicators in charts, interactive elements, button backgrounds (e.g., 'Reschedule'), and compelling card backgrounds for insights.

orange.name: Vibrant Amber
orange.usage: Secondary brand accent. Progress indicators in time tracker, activity time dots, status tags (e.g., 'Work'), and subtle branding elements.

border.name: Light UI Border
border.usage: Subtle borders around input fields, inactive buttons, and separators where needed.

shadow.name: Subtle Depth Shadow
shadow.usage: Applied to cards and interactive elements to provide a gentle lift and spatial separation without appearing heavy.

fontFamily.description: Modern sans-serif font family for clean, readable text. Inter is preferred for its excellent readability at all sizes.

sectionHeading.usage: Section titles within content areas (e.g., 'Productivity Trends')

cardMetricLarge.usage: Dominant numbers in statistic cards (e.g., '12 projects')

grid.description: 12-column grid for main content layout with explicit column/row gaps

betweenCards.usage: Horizontal and vertical spacing between cards

cards.usage: Primary container for content, data, and interactive elements

iconOnly.usage: Play/Pause/Stop buttons in Time Tracker, icon-only actions

searchBar.usage: Search inputs, text inputs, form fields

icons.usage: Navigation icons, action icons, status indicators

alertNotification.usage: Important alerts, AI insights, featured content cards

colorApplication.rule: Use purple (#6B46C1) sparingly for primary actions and key highlights. Use orange (#F59E0B) for secondary accents and progress indicators. Maintain white backgrounds for clarity.
colorApplication.avoid: Overusing accent colors, creating visual noise, using gradients except for special highlight cards

typographyHierarchy.rule: Maintain clear visual hierarchy using size, weight, and color. Hero headings should be bold and large, body text should be regular weight and readable.
typographyHierarchy.avoid: Using too many font sizes, inconsistent weights, text that's too small to read comfortably

spacingConsistency.rule: Use the defined spacing scale consistently. Maintain generous whitespace between sections and cards.
spacingConsistency.avoid: Arbitrary spacing values, cramped layouts, inconsistent gaps

componentComposition.rule: Combine components using the defined spacing and layout guidelines. Cards should have consistent padding and shadows.
componentComposition.avoid: Mixing different border radius sizes unnecessarily, inconsistent shadows, overlapping elements without clear separation
